page.title: 13Scouting in Weston Point
page.content: At 7.00pm on a Tuesday night I go to 1st Weston & Weston point scouts.The scouts starts at 7.30pm.When we've had,flag down we might go and play on a field behind the scout hall or we might do badge work.Some badges we do are 'hiker', 'computer', 'gardener', 'artist', 'entertainer' 'photographer's','explorer and fishermen'.The badge I would like first is the 'photographer's badge.The first thing you have to do is ask someone from the nearest photographic club to come down and show his or her's photographic skill's and you are then tested on this information.When we have'Flagdown' at 9.00pm we go home.
